requirements.summary: Create a Terms & Conditions page at route /terms in the React frontend. The page must display T&C content relevant to R2S Sports Champion Pro, structured with sections covering: (1) Acceptance of Terms; (2) Use of the App (permitted and prohibited uses); (3) User Accounts and Registration; (4) In-App Coins and Rewards (virtual currency, no real monetary value unless stated); (5) Leaderboard and Fair Play; (6) Intellectual Property; (7) Disclaimer of Warranties; (8) Limitation of Liability; (9) Changes to Terms; (10) Contact Us (email: mjkjbansal@gmail.com); (11) 'Last Updated: 2026' footer note.
